title: Bicyclist Seriously Injured in Lowell Collision with Car
title_page: Bicyclist Seriously Injured in Lowell Collision with Car
maintext:
LOWELL -- A bicyclist suffered serious injuries after he was struck by a car on Dutton Street near the Fletcher Street intersection at about 3:50 p.m. Monday.
The rider was unresponsive as he lay in the inbound lane of traffic as emergency crews flooded to the area to assist. A Schwinn mountain bike lay several feet away with what appeared to be a Market Basket grocery bag looped around the handlebars.
The Mercury Grand Marquis sedan that struck the bicyclist was pulled over to the side of the road nearby, with damage to the front driverâ€™s side light and a cracked windshield.
The driver stayed on scene and watched as medical personnel tended to the bicyclist. The driver also talked to police.
The bicyclist was later transported by MedFlight helicopter.
Dutton Street was closed to traffic between Fletcher and Broadway streets as officers investigated.
Follow Aaron Curtis on Twitter @aselahcurtis.
